response.original_title: Ten Years After / A Space in Time blu-ray audio
response.overview: British rock band Ten Years After's 1971 album A Space in Time is reissued for a delayed 50th anniversary celebration.  The band’s sixth, and best-selling album, features their most well-known track ‘I’d Love To Change The World’, which regularly features in movies and TV shows. The song saw the band taking a more melodic direction from previous releases and showcased the band at their peak. The brand new stereo mix is by original producer/engineer, Chris Kimsey, using transfers from the original two-inch multitrack tapes. Chris' work on the stereo mix was the basis for the new Atmos Mix.
response.title: Ten Years After / A Space in Time blu-ray audio
